title: TypedArena cannot handle zero-sized types.
body:
Seems like it just needs to be special-cased like Vec.

``` rust
extern crate arena;

use arena::TypedArena;

fn main() {
    let arena = TypedArena::new();
    arena.alloc(());
}
```
